'''Report'''

Apparently it was the last Dipro in Wallonie :(.

About the people there wasn't a lot of people this time, it was full during the morning and about 12h it was empty.

This year we can say that people know Ubuntu, we met a lot of people that using Ubuntu. And they were interested by event such as Install Party.

This time there is not a lot of donation but the donation was bigger and we can pay the stand with the donation.
